name: Medicare Prescription Drug Coverage
objective: To provide prescription drugs to Medicare beneficiaries through their voluntary participation in prescription drug plans, with an additional subsidy provided to lower-income beneficiaries.
top_agency_name: Department of Health and Human Services
sub_agency_name: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services
beneficiary_types: Physically Afflicted (e.g. TB, Arthritis, Heart Disease)
applicant_types: Native American Organizations (includes Indian groups, cooperatives, corporations, partnerships, associations)

authorizations.text: Authorized under Part D of Title XVIII of the Social Security Act.

rules_regulations: Regulations governing this program are authorized under Part D of Title XVIII of the Social Security Act and are available at 42 CFR 423.
